授業目的:
The purpose of this course is for 
students to develop their reading skills, speed and vocabulary through 
exposure to a variety of different genres of texts.
到達目標: Students will be able to: 1. read academic and other genre texts more confidently and accurately. 2. use a wider range of vocabulary, particularly academic vocabulary. 3. express opinions on various readings. 4. improve reading speeds across various readings.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1:
The class will focus on reading various text materials, discussing the 
contents, expanding academic vocabulary and engaging in other 
grammar-based activities.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour a week on homework.

教科書/Required texts0: All materials will be supplied by the instructor.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Mid-term Exam 20, Final Exam 20, Weekly Wreiting Jouranl 20, writing assingments, homework, summaries, quizzes and presentations 40.
